name: Equinox (itch) (scummbag)
description:
Equinox, a traditional Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 6 by scummbag.

Feature list: 

  • 9 dream worlds in total, with 4 accessible from the start
  • 6 effects to collect
  • Several events to witness and experience

There will likely be updates in the future, so watch this space!

Bugs may be present. If you find any, please leave a comment.

Controls and additional information are included in the game's readme file. Special thanks to collaborator *MP* for his contributions to the game's audio.
